strategy: Rule #1 of League of Legends: Don't chase Singed. You can kill him level 1 because of Lethal Tempo. His W counters your Q3 and your E, so just try not to fight him when he uses it. Whenever he ults, just disengage; he gets so many free stats and it's not worth your time or damage to fight him. Lane is very easy after Shieldbow.
